backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 206 Russell Hill Road

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 335-2020 to designate 206 Russell Hill Road (Toronto-St. Paul's, Ward 12) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.
